body:
Chapter 4321 - Chapter 4321: 4320 Changes In The Riot Zone!

Chapter 4321: 4320 changes in the riot zone!

Translator: 549690339

The withering of the tree of chaos caused the disciples of the Dragon Palace to lose a precious place for cultivation.

This made Wang Xian think of the riot zone.

Compared to the tree of chaos, the effect of cultivation in the riot zone was better.

Of course, the prerequisite was that Wang Xian had to set up a formation there to absorb the energy in the riot zone.

This was not difficult for Wang Xian.

The formation to absorb the energy in the riot zone was simple. The difficulty was that it required the fragment of the god of elements as a primer.

Wang Xian did not lack a primer.

He could definitely create a holy land for cultivation that was more powerful than the saint of Heaven’s good and the rest.

The effect was several times that of the tree of Chaos!

Setting up a cultivation ground in the riot zone would allow the improvement of the disciples of the Dragon Palace to be faster.

When the time came, they would be able to support the tree of chaos and produce four to five powerhouses in the Heaven’s origin realm. It shouldn’t be a problem.

There might even be more of them.

Of course, the main reason why there were so many powerhouses was because the resources that Wang Xian provided were too precious!

Having made up his mind, Wang Xian brought him to planet justice.

The last time Wang Xian came, he bought a house on Planet Justice League and set up a demonic altar there.

It was to make it easier for Wang Xian to come to planet Justice League in the future.

Now, it was really useful!

Under an Lie’s teleportation, Wang Xian arrived at planet justice.

He took out his Tianyuan Communicator and searched for information on the riot zone.

He wanted to see if there would be a chain reaction after he took away the primal chaos stone.

When he saw the information in the Tian Yuan communicator, his eyes flashed.

According to the discussions of the experts, nothing unexpected happened in the riot zone.

On the contrary, because of the previous incident in the riot zone, the riot zone had become more stable.

Some factions were prepared to lead their disciples to the riot zone to cultivate.

Especially that principle.

Wang Xian discovered that within a short period of time, the path that was formed due to special reasons was known as the Great Dao of reaching heaven.

By channeling the energy on both sides of the Great Dao of reaching heaven, one could create a top-notch cultivation treasure ground.

This also caused many factions to head to the riot zone to investigate.

Wang Xian read through the information one by one and had some understanding in his heart.

“An lie, follow me for the time being.”

Wang Xian instructed an lie and kept it into the mother nest.

Following that, Wang Xian rushed towards the riot zone.

He shuttled through the void rapidly. After a few thousand years, Wang Xian arrived at the front of the riot zone.

“Looks like I should build more devil spirit altars in the future. This will save me a lot of time.”

Wang Xian thought to himself.

He continued to fly forward.

“Eh?”

When he got closer to the riot zone, he discovered that there were many more powerful disciples in this area compared to the last time.

There were many floating islands.

There were many huge battleships.

There were palaces that were emitting a powerful aura.

Wang Xian even saw an extremely huge ultimate treasure of the Heaven’s origin.

Yes, it was a treasure of the Heaven’s origin.

Wang Xian was filled with astonishment.

“It seems that the changes in the riot zone have attracted many forces.”

Wang Xian scanned the area and couldn’t help but look at the huge treasure of the Heaven’s origin.

It was a treasure of the Heaven’s origin that was similar to an ancient sailboat.

A huge flag was floating on it.

There were words on the flag.

Even if Wang Xian couldn’t read the words, he could understand the meaning with a scan of his mind.

The ultimate sect!

This was the name of this faction.

Wang Xian also realized that in the Justice Union, the powerful factions all claimed to be the ultimate sect.

A faction that could use the ultimate treasure of the Heaven’s origin as an aircraft was definitely extremely powerful!

Wang Xian didn’t pay too much attention to it and flew straight in.

“The change in the riot zone this time is huge. I heard that even the energy in the core area of the cross primordial spirit has calmed down a lot and is much gentler. I wonder what happened?”

“Who knows? The changes in the riot zone must be hard for people like the sect leader to know the reason. However, this is a good thing for us!”

“Yes, it is indeed a good thing. The energy in the riot zone is extremely gentle now. The Great Dao of Heaven is basically a holy land for cultivation. I heard that many great sects have started to set up their facilities there!”

When Wang Xian arrived in front of the Great Dao of heaven, he realized that there were a large number of strong disciples around him.

This number was somewhat unbelievable in the chaos.

With a glance, he could see a few thousand people.

“HMM? The changes in this chaotic area are much greater than I imagined.”

Wang Xian mumbled. It seemed that there were changes again during the time he flew over.

Furthermore, when Wang Xian swept his gaze across the surroundings, he actually discovered an expert in the ruler realm.

It was completely nonsensical for an expert in the ruler realm to come here previously.

Just that terrifying energy pressure was enough to make it difficult for them to move an inch.

Any stone that flew out would be able to annihilate them.

But now, there were quite a few rulers.

And some rulers even directly floated in the air, absorbing energy.

In this Great Dao of heaven, even if one didn’t rely on the Elemental God to set up a formation to absorb energy, it was still a top-tier cultivation treasure ground.

It was even higher than the tree of Chaos!

“The surrounding energy is indeed much more stable. No wonder so many disciples have come.”

Wang Xian looked at the two sides of the Great Dao of Tongtian and felt that the energy was extremely gentle.

This made him extremely surprised.

One had to know that the last time when he and Old Man Song Pagoda Sword were flying here, Chaos Stones would fly out from time to time.

“Does this have anything to do with me taking away the primal Chaos Stones?”

Wang Xian guessed in his heart.

He continued to fly forward.

When he discovered some forces, they began to set up palaces, set up formations, and build cultivation treasures here.

Wang Xian looked around curiously and continued to fly in.

He was not in a hurry to set up a paradise here. Instead, he was prepared to explore the surroundings.

In addition, he would make a trip to the cross-shaped primordial spirit region to see if there were any special changes there.

After flying for more than ten days, Wang Xian arrived at the end of the Great Dao of heaven.

At the end of the Great Dao, there was originally an incomparably violent quicksand.

In the end, although it was also quicksand, it was much gentler.

After Wang Xian entered the area, he felt that even a powerhouse who had just entered the Heaven’s origin realm would be able to withstand it.

“What a huge change!”

Wang Xian was astonished as he continued to fly forward.

“I wonder if I will meet that spirit kneader?”

“If there’s a chance in the future, I will definitely make you pay the price. HMPH!”

Wang Xian thought of the three spirit kneader who attacked him. He narrowed his eyes slightly. He would remember this grudge.

He would get his revenge sooner or later!
